item.title: EP 888 - The Battlefield On The Edge Of Yesterday
item.itunes:title: The Battlefield On The Edge Of Yesterday
item.description:
Today we meet super soldier Russ Kellett and learn some vampires don’t have teeth, and then we travel to Afghanistan to meet a soldier who is saved by a fallen war hero!
